name: Love Hentai: Endgame
description:
In this game you have to find a couple among the many sexual christmas lolis! At each level you have exactly one minute, all cards are closed.
Your goal is to find a pair as quickly as possible. With each new level everything is more complicated, but! and the number of hot girls increases!Features:
- Develops memory;

- Develops logic;

- Develops a hand;

- Develops a friend's hand;)

- More than 50 hot hentai lolis;
